description: Grassy-leaved sweet flag (Acorus gramineus 'Minimus Aureus') is an amazing plant species! Its lush, golden-green foliage forms evergreen clumps that stay vibrant all year round. The foliage is aromatic and gives off a pleasant, earthy scent with a hint of sweetness. It grows in shallow water and is an ideal aquatic plant for ponds and bog gardens, as it will thrive in a wide range of water depths and conditions. Its beautiful foliage and pleasant scent make it a wonderful addition to any water garden!
